entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:52 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 1:46 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 93 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
